content.raw:
Yes, it is. If line 36 is removed, the launchfile does not start, and the following message is given:

```
unused args [model_args] for include of [/home/jackie/drc_ws/install/share/drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_bringup.launch]
The traceback for the exception was written to the log file
```

If the include is removed entirely (lines 35-37), then atlas_bringup does not run, the standing controller doesn't work, and the correct model version is not loaded.
content.html:
Yes, it is. If line 36 is removed, the launchfile does not start, and the following message is given:

unused args [model_args] for include of [/home/jackie/drc_ws/install/share/drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_bringup.launch]
The traceback for the exception was written to the log file

If the include is removed entirely (lines 35-37), then atlas_bringup does not run, the standing controller doesn't work, and the correct model version is not loaded.
